body: @ClarkGuan I understand that readelf says one thing and `GOARM` says something else.  I think you are saying that it only matters because of readelf, and otherwise does not matter.  That sounds like a problem that is not very important.  This issue open and marked as needing a fix.  However, somebody will have to write that fix.  If it only matters for readelf, then I do not plan to work on it myself.  I hope that somebody else will.
